name: Impostor Master: Red Solo Kill
description:
Your mission will be sabotage the rooms, sneak through vents, deceive, and frame others to remain anonymous and kill off ones. Targets with automatic report and cab be run around us to find the killer. Attack them swiftly and escape without being spotted.

HOW TO PLAY:
- Control the Hell Rabbit and hunt down your targets one by one. Use your surroundings and items to stay hidden from finder.

GAME FEATURES:
- Easy controls!
- Intuitive interface!
- Nice and smooth graphics!

Let's play Impostor Master: Red Solo Kill to do hunt and kill them all!
